DOC.brief_summary: This study test effectiveness computer-assisted screen identify patient risk intimate partner violence ( IPV ) Canadian family practice . It hypothesize use computer-assisted screening among female patient would lead high rate IPV discussion-opportunity IPV detection medical consultation , compare patient receive standard medical care .
DOC.brief_title: Computer-assisted Screening Intimate Partner Violence Family Practice
